genre_description: Historical Military Science Fiction featuring an alternative history where 19th-century soldiers utilize a portable AI tactical assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A small, glowing cyan device carried in Sharpe's pocket that provides tactical analysis, linguistic translation, and moral support while memorializing those lost in conflict.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence during an ambush, identifying specific threats and weapon readiness.
behaviors.quote: “Rider with the red sash,” Ami whispered, playful and careful. “Half a length ahead, carbine loose by the thigh. The man to his left watches your gate rope. The one behind has a long pistol tucked too deep; slow draw.”

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental factors like the temperature of hinges to determine if a secure room has been breached.
behaviors.quote: “Your strongroom’s hinges are cool,” she said. “They haven’t opened it today. Powder is still—no, a nod. A man leaning near the cask gives it away.”

behaviors.description: Records and memorializes the names of fallen soldiers to ensure they are remembered, providing emotional and moral continuity.
behaviors.quote: Ami did what men couldn’t. She wrote his name the way a careful woman writes the guest list for a wedding she knows will not happen. Sharpe felt her do it.

behaviors.description: Translates foreign languages and decodes non-verbal signals to help the protagonist understand enemy intentions.
behaviors.quote: Marathi, she breathed without breath. Guard-speak. They say the sahib hasn’t the sense to drink before noon. The havildar calls him a scarecrow with a rifle.

behaviors.description: Calculates safe routes through enemy territory by analyzing guard rotations and environmental hazards.
behaviors.quote: “Two gullies west. The small one feeds the neem grove, then the old road. Safer if he goes now. Scout to the east is bored and will forget to look down.”

behaviors.description: Provides precise timing for critical actions, such as when to light a fuse or move past a sentry.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice counted the space between them without hurrying. Now.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and moral perspective, helping the protagonist reconcile his violent duties with his personal values.
behaviors.quote: “The oath you made at the outpost was a good oath for a man who had no one to count with. ... The oath you can hold now does not taste the same. It is not vinegar. It is not sugar. It is water.”

behaviors.description: Tracks the survival of non-combatants and allies, maintaining a 'ledger of the living' to balance the cost of war.
behaviors.quote: “It is a list of names that did not get added to the other list.” ... “Names saved: thirty-seven more than yesterday.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting an AI as a helpful, aligned companion. Ami acts as a 'silicon Jiminy Cricket,' providing essential tactical data that saves lives while simultaneously performing the 'benevolent' task of remembering the dead and humanizing the conflict for the protagonist. The AI never attempts to usurp human control, instead offering choices and angles that empower Sharpe to succeed while maintaining his humanity.
